alert.note: Alert for Chickasaw; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 22 at 10:01PM CDT until July 22 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN FAYETTE AND SOUTHEASTERN CHICKASAW COUNTIES... At 959 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fredericksburg, or 12 miles southeast of New Hampton, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. This severe storm will be near... Hawkeye around 1010 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include County Roads B 54 And V 56, Donnan, Highway 93 And County V 68, Alpha, Richfield, Highway 18 And County V 56 and Randalia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
